properties.Name: InvoiceDunningCommunication

Columns.Name: CommunicationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Dunning Letter.

Columns.Name: Date
Columns.Description: The date of the Order Dunning Letter.

Columns.Name: CustomerAccountId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer Account.

Columns.Name: Text
Columns.Description: The text/contents of the Dunning Letter.

Columns.Name: ResponsibleEmployeeId
Columns.Description: The Employee responsible for the Dunning Letter.

Columns.Name: DunningAmount
Columns.Description: The amount referred to in the Dunning Communication.

Columns.Name: ResultedInFullPaymentIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates that the Dunning Letter resulted in full payment of the outstanding amount.

Columns.Name: ResultedInPartialPaymentIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates that the Dunning Letter resulted in partial payment of the outstanding amount.

Columns.Name: InvoiceId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Invoice.

Columns.Name: CommunicationMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Communication Method.

Columns.Name: DunningCommunicationNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Dunning communication.
